mean_height.title: Mean Height
mean_height.description: Mean height above ground of vegetation points (Z >= 0.5 m)

mean_canopy_height.title: Mean Canopy Height
mean_canopy_height.description: Mean pixel from 1m² canopy height model (CHM). CHM is defined as maximum height within 1m² cell

q100.title: Maximum Height (Q100)
q100.description: Maximum height (100th percentile) above ground of vegetation points (Z >= 0.5 m)

q99.title: 99th Percentile Height (Q99)
q99.description: 99th percentile height above ground of vegetation points (Z >= 0.5 m)

q95.title: 95th Percentile Height (Q95)
q95.description: 95th percentile height above ground of vegetation points (Z >= 0.5 m)

q75.title: 75th Percentile Height (Q75)
q75.description: 75th percentile height above ground of vegetation points (Z >= 0.5 m)

q50.title: Median Height (Q50)
q50.description: Median height above ground of vegetation points (Z >= 0.5 m)

q25.title: 25th Percentile Height (Q25)
q25.description: 25th percentile height above ground of vegetation points (Z >= 0.5 m)

q5.title: 5th Percentile Height (Q5)
q5.description: 5th percentile height above ground of vegetation points (Z >= 0.5 m)

q1.title: 1st Percentile Height (Q1)
q1.description: 1st percentile height above ground of vegetation points (Z >= 0.5 m)

q0.title: Minimum Height (Q0)
q0.description: Minimum height (0th percentile) above ground of vegetation points (Z >= 0.5 m)

proportion_above_2.title: Proportion Above 2m
proportion_above_2.description: Number of points with height above ground > 2, divided by total number of points

deep_gap_fraction_05.title: Deep Gap Fraction (0.5m)
deep_gap_fraction_05.description: Number of gap pixels in CHM divided by total number of pixel. A gap is a pixel with a height <= 0.5 m

deep_gap_fraction_2.title: Deep Gap Fraction (2m)
deep_gap_fraction_2.description: Number of gap pixels in CHM divided by total number of pixel. A gap is a pixel with a height <= 2 m

gap_fraction_profile.title: Gap Fraction Profile
gap_fraction_profile.description: Gap fraction profile - vertical distribution of gaps

top_rugosity.title: Top Rugosity
top_rugosity.description: Standard deviation of 1m² canopy height model

rumple_index.title: Rumple Index
rumple_index.description: Rumple index - ratio of canopy surface area to ground surface area

coeff_var_of_height.title: Coefficient of Variation of Height
coeff_var_of_height.description: Coefficient of variation of height. SDH / MH

gini_coeff_index.title: Gini Coefficient Index
gini_coeff_index.description: Gini coefficient index, taken from https://pysal.org/inequality/generated/inequality.gini.Gini.html. Computed on vegetation points (Z > 0.5).

mean_of_sd_of_height.title: Mean of Standard Deviation of height
mean_of_sd_of_height.description: Mean of pixels from the 1 m² standard deviation of height of vegetation points (Z > 0.5) raster.

sd_of_sd_of_height.title: Standard Deviation of Standard Deviation of Height
sd_of_sd_of_height.description: Standard deviation of pixels from the 1 m² standard deviation of height of vegetation points (Z > 0.5) raster.

pulse_density.title: Pulse Density
pulse_density.description: Number of first returns divided by plot area

point_density.title: Point Density
point_density.description: Number of all returns divided by plot area

scan_angle_half_width.title: Scan Angle Half Width
scan_angle_half_width.description: Scan angle swath width. Calculated as max(abs(min_scan_angle), abs(max_scan_angle))
